item.title: whoami
item.description: Currently, I am actively competing in Capture The Flag (CTF) events as a member of the Hellbound team, focusing on pwn and other security-related challenges. My journey into security research began in earnest after graduating from high school, when I discovered my passion for pwn and reverse engineering. This led me to join the CTF team /bin/catz in mid-2022, where I honed my skills before taking a brief hiatus to deepen my understanding of computer security and software development fundamentals.
